1.4.6.name: wordpress/the-skeleton
1.4.6.description: Simple Responsive theme with WooCommerce and bbPress Compatibility. Theme features 7 Page Templates, 5 Widget Areas (Main Sidebar, Sidebar Left, 3 Widget Columns for front page featured content), 3 Menu Positions (Top Menu, Main Menu and Footer Menu). Simple Theme Options to insert your own Custom CSS, Front Page Section (change WooCommerce Header area for featured content, change featured content area header, change blogging header, Enable / Disable WooCommerce Section and Featured Section), Social links (change facebook,twitter and email links), Sidebar Controller (change/insert left sidebar for posts,pages and archives). Localization Ready - to be translated into your own language (Included language of English Only), RTL-Language Support. Support for this theme can be found here   http://www.trottyzone.com/forums/forum/wordpress-themes/the-skeleton/   . Thanks for downloading and happy blogging. :)
